title: The Living Root Cellar
typeOfFood: Vegan, American, Organic, Raw, Fast food, Juice bar, Take-out, Fusion
description: Opened in Nov 2013, this is a juice bar and cafe offering cold pressed juices and nutrient-rich smoothies along with a to-go case containing packaged, ready-to-eat foods like pate wrap and hemp bars. Its downstairs cafe is open for weekday lunch. The menu includes daily specials, raw and cooked vegan food.
